name: Quarky Space Explorer
description:
A quirky space exploration "point and click" adventure. You begin on your Hōm planet with a voice in your head prompting you to explore the galaxy. But in order to achieve escape velocity, you must get your friends to love you to fill your heartpack with energy.

We originally had five planets planned, then we cut back the scope to three. We have assets for all three planets, but dev only got one done. So it's merely a prototype, not a competed game.

Game made for Ludum Dare 38. (4/24/17)

Luna "jamgrrl" Lindsey - Art, Sound, Writing, Concept

Stephan "Bamboy" Ennen - Programming and putting it all together
